EXTRACTED VALUE: Much of the changes in Civ Rev are of the give and take variety ultimately streamlining gameplay with little sacrifice.
Enormous, intelligent, wily - a true dragon. [Sept 2007, p.98]
Crackdown is ridiculously fun, and that "Halo 3" beta code may go unused for longer than you think. [Mar 2007, p.88]
This is, in all possibility, the most stunningly attractive game the PlayStation has ever known.
Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock delivers on nearly all counts. A fix for the online issues and this could very well be the best of the franchise.
It was one of the best, if not the gold standard for sports genre video games last year, and it looks set to re-claim that title yet again this year.
The most important aspect to fans of the series is obliviously going to be how the game performs in multiplayer, which rest assured is fantastic.
I am going to go out on a limb here and say that this may very well be the best racing game of all time. Yes, you read that correctly.
Move over "Final Fantasy IX," I think we have new #1 contender for RPG of the year, and it is "Chrono Cross."
If you enjoy horror games, or if you just want to experience a true next-gen game, you owe it to yourself to pick up Condemned: Criminal Origins.
Treyarch has done an amazing job with this game and has quite possibly constructed on of the best online experiences currently available anywhere.
More precise skate speed control and a revised skill stick make NHL 08 an icy-hot dream.
Not only are the graphics as good as they can be, but the game sports some of the most compelling game modes found in a fighting game.
It's a shame that the multiplayer options don't include a cop pursuit mode, but that's a minor omission in a one-game-fits-all package.
With beautiful music, graphics and dynamic gameplay Final Fantasy VII is a testament to the evolution of video games.
